body: That desire has ever built, have approachedHomeward into the howling woods, althoughAgainst this sky no longer of our world.to matter, for the flushed boys are muscularSnaps of ice cracking in the hidden air.Its consciousness of my white consciousness,Toward the still dab of white that oscillatesHigh on this surface, guarding the edge of PèreRight, and appears from here to be overcomeSnow haze gleams like sand.Summer bees were sayingOh, I know. The snow. The effective snowMerely a mockery of springAnd he is swathed in ever-petrified dread;Where, as I discover as I go throughColumbuses or Gamas, ever pass,VIII. Russia: The Great Northern Expeditionand preening, dancing on the basepaths,Where lamps are lit: these, too,
